244264.en:
What are you doing? I'm incredibly busy right
now. Get out of here as fast as you can.

244265.en:
<attr><feel_think_one><end_attr>Hmm. I thought if I waited here, he'd show up,
but what if he's not who I think he is?

244266.en:
That face looks familiar! At last you have appeared, my chosen one. I believe your name is . I have been waiting for your
arrival. I don't need to tell you why. The mysterious incident you once experienced. If you wish to get closer to the truth of it,
will you lend me your help?

244267.en:
That's right, isn't it? Now, right off the bat, I want you to find a notebook with a silver cover. It's a very important notebook.
I used to carry it with me all the time, but when I realized it had disappeared from my closet. I believe that I dropped it somewhere
during my investigation the other day. However, if I go looking for it, unforeseen circumstances may arise, so I would like you
to do it for me. First, you are to visit an Elf woman named Hamayuri who lives in Royal City Kamiharmui South and see if she has
picked up the notebook! If you find the Silver Notebook, good. If not, come back to me to report it!
244267.ja:

244268.en:
I'm sure you're right. But unfortunately, you seem to be busy with other requests. In such a state, you were not ready to lend your help to
I. I would like you to come back when you are free. I would like you to come back when you are free.
244268.ja:
ã€Œãã†ã ã‚ã†ã€€ãã†ã ã‚ã†ã€‚ ã€€ã ãŒã€€æ®‹å¿µãªã“ã¨ã«ã€€è²´æ§˜ã¯ ã€€ä»–ã®é ¼ã¾ã‚Œã”ã¨ã§ã€€æ‰‹ãŒç©ºã„ã¦ãŠã‚‰ã‚“ã¨è¦‹ãˆã‚‹ã€‚
ã€Œãã‚“ãªæ§˜å­ã§ã¯ã€€ãƒ¯ã‚¬ãƒã‚¤ã« ã€€ãƒã‚«ãƒ©ã‚’è²¸ã™ã©ã“ã‚ã§ã¯ã€€ãªã‹ã‚ã†ã€‚ ã€€æ‰‹ã‚’ç©ºã‘ã¦ã‹ã‚‰ã€€ã¾ãŸã€€æ¥ã¦ã»ã—ã„ã®ã§ã‚ã‚‹ã€‚

244269.en:
Hou. You know Kunai, don't you? But I would
like you to reconsider, because that would
make things difficult for me!

244270.en:
O chosen one . I have been waiting for your arrival. I do not need to tell you why. The mysterious incident you once
experienced. If you wish to get closer to the truth of it, will you lend me your help?

244271.en:
I need you to find a notebook with a silver
cover that I have lost. It is a very important
notebook.<open_irai><bw_break>

244272.en:
I think I may have dropped it somewhere during my investigation the other day. First, I will visit an Elf woman named Hamayuri who lives in
Royal City Kamiharmui South to see if she has picked up any notebooks! If the Silver Notebook is found, good. If not, come back to
me to report it!

244273.en:
You're back . I'm sorry to hear that your guess tells you that the Silver Notebook was not found. I am sorry to hear
that, but I would like to ask you a question. Please tell me if Hamayuri had anything to say about me.

244274.en:
Hmm... It seems that it has returned to its previous state. I guess it is because it is no longer in my hands that it has lost its power
and cannot influence me anymore. Let me tell you something about the notebook. It was found when I was locked inside the door of Silver
Hill. I can't explain more than that. I would like you to continue your search for the Silver Notebook. I want you to visit a Dwarf
woman named Makurima in the Dolworm Kingdom. The Silver Notebook may be found there.
244274.ja:
ã€Œãµã‚€â€¦â€¦ã€‚ã©ã†ã‚„ã‚‰ã€€ä»¥å‰ã®çŠ¶æ…‹ã« ã€€æˆ»ã£ã¦ã—ã¾ã£ãŸã‚ˆã†ã§ã‚ã‚‹ãªã€‚
ã€Œãƒ¯ã‚¬ãƒã‚¤ã®æ‰‹å…ƒã‹ã‚‰ã€€ã¯ãªã‚ŒãŸã“ã¨ã§ ã€€ãƒã‚«ãƒ©ãŒå¼±ã¾ã‚Šã€€å½±éŸ¿ã‚’ä¸ãˆã‚‰ã‚Œãªããªã£ãŸ ã€€â€¦â€¦ã¨ã„ã†ã“ã¨ã§ã‚ã‚‹ã‹ã€‚
ã€Œãƒãƒ¼ãƒˆã®ã“ã¨ã‚’ã€€ã™ã“ã—ã€€æ•™ãˆã¦ãŠã“ã†ã€‚ ã€€ã‚ã‚Œã¯ã€€ãƒ¯ã‚¬ãƒã‚¤ãŒã€€éŠ€ã®ä¸˜ã®æ‰‰ã®ä¸­ã« ã€€é–‰ã˜è¾¼ã‚ã‚‰ã‚Œã¦ã„ãŸã¨ãã«ã€€è¦‹ã¤ã‘ãŸã‚‚ã®ã ã€‚
ã€Œâ€¦â€¦ãã‚Œä»¥ä¸Šã¯ã€€ã¾ã èª¬æ˜ã§ãã¬ã€‚ ã€€è²´æ§˜ã«ã¯ã€€å¼•ãç¶šã ã€€éŠ€è‰²ã®ãƒãƒ¼ãƒˆã‚’ã€€æ¢ã—ã¦ã‚‚ã‚‰ã„ãŸã„ã®ã§ã‚ã‚‹ã€‚
ã€Œãƒ‰ãƒ«ãƒ¯ãƒ¼ãƒ ç‹å›½ã«ä½ã‚€ã€€ãƒã‚¯ãƒªãƒã¨ã„ã†åã® ã€€ãƒ‰ãƒ¯ãƒ¼ãƒ•ã®å¥³æ€§ã‚’ã€€è¨ªã­ã¦ã»ã—ã„ã®ã ã€‚ ã€€éŠ€è‰²ã®ãƒãƒ¼ãƒˆã¯ã€€ãã“ã«ã‚ã‚‹ã‹ã‚‚ã—ã‚Œã¬ã€‚

244275.en:
informed Inspector Pakul that Hamayuri had mentioned that he had met Inspector Pakul in his previous place of
residence.

244276.en:
The reason why Hamayuri has returned to its previous state is probably because it is no longer in my hands and its power has weakened.
Let me tell you something about the notebook. It was found when I was locked inside the door of Silver Hill. I can't explain more than
that. I would like you to continue your search for the Silver Notebook.
244276.ja:
ã€Œãƒãƒãƒ¦ãƒªãŒã€€ä»¥å‰ã®çŠ¶æ…‹ã«æˆ»ã£ã¦ã—ã¾ã£ãŸã®ã¯ ã€€ã‚„ã¯ã‚Šã€€ãƒ¯ã‚¬ãƒã‚¤ã®æ‰‹å…ƒã‹ã‚‰ã€€ã¯ãªã‚Œã¦ ã€€ãƒã‚«ãƒ©ãŒå¼±ã¾ã£ãŸã“ã¨ãŒã€€åŸå› ã§ã‚ã‚ã†ãªâ€¦â€¦ã€‚
ã€Œãƒãƒ¼ãƒˆã®ã“ã¨ã‚’ã€€ã™ã“ã—ã€€æ•™ãˆã¦ãŠã“ã†ã€‚ ã€€ã‚ã‚Œã¯ã€€ãƒ¯ã‚¬ãƒã‚¤ãŒã€€éŠ€ã®ä¸˜ã®æ‰‰ã®ä¸­ã« ã€€é–‰ã˜è¾¼ã‚ã‚‰ã‚Œã¦ã„ãŸã¨ãã«ã€€è¦‹ã¤ã‘ãŸã‚‚ã®ã ã€‚
ã€Œâ€¦â€¦ãã‚Œä»¥ä¸Šã¯ã€€ã¾ã èª¬æ˜ã§ãã¬ã€‚ ã€€è²´æ§˜ã«ã¯ã€€å¼•ãç¶šã ã€€éŠ€è‰²ã®ãƒãƒ¼ãƒˆã‚’ã€€æ¢ã—ã¦ã‚‚ã‚‰ã„ãŸã„ã®ã§ã‚ã‚‹ã€‚

244277.en:
I want you to visit a Dwarf woman named
Makurima who lives in Dolworm Kingdom. Silver
Notebook may be there.

244279.en:
Oops, sorry about that. I must have eaten a little too much Banana. I don't know who it was, but someone had the good sense to send me
one of my favorite foods. Well, . It is written on the face that the Silver Notebook was not found this time either. When
I found the notebook, there was nothing written in it, it was completely blank. The vast, pure white earth. It is inevitable to
want to leave one's own footprints. I, who had been bored from being locked inside the door of Silver Hill, wrote down my secret thoughts
in a notebook. Next, I'll head to the tavern in Julet Town and ask a Weddie woman named Kerine to check it out. She'll make sure to
find the Silver Notebook!
244279.ja:
ã€ŒãŠã£ã¨ã€€ã“ã‚Œã¯ã€€å¤±æ•¬ã€‚ ã€€ã™ã“ã—ã°ã‹ã‚Šã€€ãƒãƒŠãƒŠã‚’ ã€€é£Ÿã¹ã™ãã¦ã—ã¾ã£ãŸã‚ˆã†ã§ã‚ã‚‹ãªã€‚
ã€Œèª°ã‹ã¯ã€€ã‚ã‹ã‚‰ãªã„ãŒ ã€€ãƒ¯ã‚¬ãƒã‚¤ã®å¥½ç‰©ã‚’ã€€å·®ã—å…¥ã‚Œã«å¯„ã“ã™ã¨ã¯ ã€€è¦‹ã©ã“ã‚ã®ã‚ã‚‹è€…ãŒã€€ã„ãŸã‚‚ã®ã ã€‚

ã€Œåºƒå¤§ãªã‚‹ã€€ç´”ç™½ã®å¤§åœ°â€¦â€¦ã€‚ ã€€ã¿ãšã‹ã‚‰ã®è¶³è·¡ã‚’æ®‹ã—ãŸããªã‚‹ã®ã¯ã€€å¿…ç„¶ã€‚

ã€Œã§ã¯ã€€æ¬¡ã¯ã€€ã‚¸ãƒ¥ãƒ¬ãƒƒãƒˆã®ç”ºã®é…’å ´ã«å‘ã‹ã„ ã€€ã‚±ãƒªãƒ¼ãƒŒã¨ã„ã†ã‚¦ã‚§ãƒ‡ã‚£ã®å¥³æ€§ã«ã€€ç¢ºèªã‚’é ¼ã‚€ã€‚ ã€€å¿…ãšã€€éŠ€è‰²ã®ãƒãƒ¼ãƒˆã‚’ã€€è¦‹ã¤ã‘ã¦ãã‚‹ã®ã§ã‚ã‚‹ï¼

244280.en:
...When I found it in the doorway of Silver Hill,
the Silver Notebook was completely blank, with
no writing on it.<open_irai><bw_break>

244281.en:
The vast, pure white land... It is inevitable that one would want to leave one's own footprints. Locked in a doorway with nothing
better to do, I wrote down my secret thoughts in a notebook. Next, I'll head to the tavern in Julet Town and ask a Weddie woman named
Kerine to check it out. She'll make sure to find the Silver Notebook!

244282.en:
Mmmm! That face has found Silver Notebook this
time! I've found Silver Notebook this time!<open_irai><bw_break>

244283.en:
<pipipi_mid>Phew... Looks like it worked. Hey <pc>.
It's me, Fostail. Long time no see?<bw_break>
244283.ja:
ã€Œãµãµã£â€¦â€¦ã€‚ ã€€ã©ã†ã‚„ã‚‰ã€€ã†ã¾ãã„ã£ãŸã‚ˆã†ã ã­ã€‚
ã€Œã‚„ã‚ã€€ã€‚ ã€€ç§ã ã‚ˆã€‚ãƒ•ã‚©ã‚¹ãƒ†ã‚¤ãƒ«ã ã€‚ ã€€ã²ã•ã—ã¶ã‚Šâ€¦â€¦ã‹ãªï¼Ÿ

244284.en:
I'm sorry for the trouble I've caused you. I made that notebook. It was a prototype of the notebook that Queen Alwe had. It was a
dangerous thing, because its power to make the written contents real was so unstable that anything could happen to it. I had hidden it
in a space inside the door of Silver Hill with the intention of disposing of it later, but I had completely forgotten about its existence.
He found it. So I sent Banana to get him to get rid of the notebook. I'm sorry, but it had to be done. Now that I've done what I had to
do, I'll leave you to it.
244284.ja:
ã€Œå›ã«ã¯ã€€è¿·æƒ‘ã‚’ã‹ã‘ã¦ã—ã¾ã£ã¦ã€€ã™ã¾ãªã„ã€‚ ã€€ã‚ã®ãƒãƒ¼ãƒˆã¯ã€€ç§ãŒã€€ä½œã£ãŸã‚‚ã®ã§ã­ã€‚ ã€€ã‚¢ãƒ«ã‚¦ã‚§ç‹å¦ƒãŒæŒã£ã¦ã„ãŸãƒãƒ¼ãƒˆã®ã€€è©¦ä½œå“ã•ã€‚

ã€Œãã‚Œã‚’ã€€å½¼ãŒã€€è¦‹ã¤ã‘ã¦ã—ã¾ã£ãŸã‚ˆã†ã ã€‚ ã€€ã ã‹ã‚‰ã€€ãƒãƒŠãƒŠã‚’é€ã‚Šã¤ã‘ã¦ ã€€ãƒãƒ¼ãƒˆãŒå‡¦åˆ†ã•ã‚Œã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã€€ä»•å‘ã‘ã¦ã¿ãŸã®ã•ã€‚
ã€Œå½¼ã«ã¯æ‚ªã„ãŒã€€ä»•æ–¹ãŒãªã„ã“ã¨ã ã€‚ ã€€ç”¨ã¯æ¸ˆã‚“ã ã®ã§ã€€ç§ã¯ã€€å¤±ç¤¼ã™ã‚‹ã‚ˆâ€¦â€¦ã€‚

244285.en:
Oh, wow. That face is the face that found the Silver Notebook and has already checked its contents. Then, let's have him hand over the
notebook, shall we?

244286.en:
...Oh. You're going to defy this P890 with the dilemma of an assistant candidate? Give me the notebook right now and I promise you won't be
sorry.

244287.en:
Hmm. That's certainly my notebook. Thank you very much.
Sometimes, . Do you know the name of the Space-Time Inspection Agency
Keibu written there?

244288.en:
I cannot be mocked. You want to know the
truth. The name Keibu rings a bell?<yesno><break>

244289.en:
...As I thought. You were the one who was assigned to an undecided adventurer. Now then. As I'm sure you already know, the incidents
you experienced the other day were all the work of this notebook.
244289.ja:
ã€Œâ€¦â€¦ã‚„ã¯ã‚Šãªã€‚é…å½¹ãŒã€€æœªå®šã ã£ãŸå†’é™ºè€…ã« ã€€å½“ã¦ã¯ã‚ã‚‰ã‚ŒãŸã®ã¯ã€€è²´æ§˜ã ã£ãŸã‚ã‘ã ã€‚
ã€Œã•ã¦â€¦â€¦ã€‚ã‚‚ã†ã€€ã‚ã‹ã£ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã ã‚ã†ãŒ ã€€è²´æ§˜ãŒã€€å…ˆæ—¥ã€€ä½“é¨“ã—ãŸäº‹ä»¶ã¯ ã€€ã™ã¹ã¦ã€€ã“ã®ãƒãƒ¼ãƒˆã®ã—ã‚ã–ã§ã‚ã‚‹ã€‚

244290.en:
It all began when I wrote in a notebook a series of original and wonderful settings inside the door of Silver Hill. After escaping
from the door, I abandoned the house where the debt collector was waiting for me and made this cave my new home, where I spent my days.
I spent my days designing agent outfits and building models of the Mist Device in order to express the setting in more detail. One day. I
was knocked unconscious by the light emitted from the notebook. When I regained consciousness, I was already Agent P890 of
Keibu, the Space-Time Inspection Agency. The rest of the story is as you know it. I's setup had become a reality until I defeated Eraser
GE50 with you. I had given it away when I was cleaning up after the incident, and its effects were wearing off, but now the notebook
is back in my hands.
244290.ja:
ã€ŒéŠ€ã®ä¸˜ã®æ‰‰ã®ä¸­ã§ã€€ãƒ¯ã‚¬ãƒã‚¤ãŒ ã€€ç‹¬å‰µçš„ã‹ã¤ã€€ã™ã°ã‚‰ã—ã„è¨­å®šã®æ•°ã€…ã‚’ ã€€ãƒãƒ¼ãƒˆã«æ›¸ãã¤ã‚‰ã­ãŸã“ã¨ãŒã€€ã™ã¹ã¦ã®å§‹ã¾ã‚Šã€‚

244291.en:
With this notebook, I can do whatever I want! I will add new settings, and will be active as an agent to protect the peace of the whole
universe! And then, . I am not at all surprised to have you appear again as I's assistant! You can thank me for this, but it
takes time to add a lot of settings. You may accept my thanks for the time being.

244292.en:
Well... let's see. I will now be busy working on
my butler's pen. You, too, can look forward to
it!

244293.en:
...Mmm. Silver Notebook has burned to true white ashes.
.........Well, I can't help it if it's gone. Well, what's lost can't be helped. I'll just
have to chalk it up to a good dream. I will go back to the basics and continue my activities as a police inspector protecting those close
to me. And one day, I will use my power to fulfill the ideal of I by I for I!

244294.en: Give Inspector Pakul the Silver Notebook?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

244295.en:
<pc> handed over the Silver Notebook
to Inspector Pakul.

244296.en:
Inspector Pakul walked towards the tent with
his Silver Notebook in hand. However, he
stepped on a Banana Peel and fell down!<se FQ_208_1 0><bw_break>

244297.en:
The Silver Notebook flew into the air and fell
into the Bonfire! The fire is spreading to the
notebook.<se FQ_208_1 1>

244298.en:
Out of nowhere, <pc> heard a voice in
his head.

244299.en:
The Silver Notebook was burned up and gone, but it couldn't be helped. I'll just have to chalk it up to a good dream. Hmm? I don't seem
too disappointed? Hmmm. That's as it should be. I don't dwell on the past. That's what I am!

247479.en:
But you haven't looked inside the notebook yet. If you haven't, take a look at it right now. You have that right. Once you have looked
inside the notebook, you must speak to I once more.
